proj_about:
Simulates an e-retailer site where a user can view, filter through, add/remove items from bag, and finally purchase items. This was built without backend functionality. Everything works solely on React. This is a personal project which showcases my ability to build a full React site with multiple functionalities from scratch.

Tools: HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, React

Displays Pokemon and their data retrieved from PokeAPI. This is a personal project to showcase my ability to consume APIs.

Tools: HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, React

A business site which displays the services and assets of a makeshift gym. Designed to encourage potential customers to submit a form and register for a gym membership. This is a personal project to showcase my ability to design an SPA from scratch.

Tools: HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript
